title: [R.G. Mechanics] Far Cry 3: Blood Dragon
description:
*Not my torrent. Just noticed The Bay didn't have this so I uploaded what 
I found elsewhere*

Stand-Alone game...does not require Far Cry 3 to be installed to play.

Worked perfectly for me.
